comment: Not my favorite but a well made rye
seems good. only had it in an old fashioned
Fantastic. Can't go wrong with this one. Oily.
OK but not very favorful for a rye
Quite sweet, loved it first time I had, not as much on second tasting. Probably have to be in the mood.
Heerlijk in London. Tussen whiskey en rum in
a nice rye. tastes far better than current rating.
Clove and pine on the nose. Sweet and nothing more. Tastes younger than 10 years.
Pine on the nose. Striking at first taste, with subtle pine afterwards. Average. Not bad, but not world-beating. 2.5.
Vanilla, rye spice, old leather, shoe polish, juicy fruit, oak, bay leafs, spicy on the taste, lots of wood, and tannins, hint of milk chocolate on the finish. Solid rye. [87]
Faint vegetal nose, initially slight notes of sweetness and spice. But after a little Kentucky chew in the mouth it opens up very nicely.
Superbly smooth, flavorful, and well rounded rye. Subtlety sweet and Spicy. Wish this product was on the shelf all the time.
